name: Classic Döner
description: Freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat served in homemade pita bread with fried vegetables (eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, carrot, potatoes), crisp salad, lemon juice, aromatic herbs, spices, and your choice of sauce.

name: Döner with Cheese
description: Freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat in homemade pita bread with fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, Balkan-style cheese, herbs, spices, and your choice of sauce.

name: Döner – Only Meat
description: A generous portion of freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat in homemade pita bread, seasoned with aromatic herbs and spices, served with your choice of sauce.

name: Extra Large Döner
description: An extra-large portion of freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat in homemade pita bread with fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, Balkan-style cheese, herbs, spices, and your choice of sauce.

name: Small Döner
description: A smaller portion of freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat in homemade pita bread with fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, herbs, spices, and your choice of sauce.

name: Classic Dürüm
description: Freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat wrapped in a homemade tortilla with fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, herbs, spices, and your choice of sauce.

name: Dürüm with Cheese
description: Freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat wrapped in a homemade tortilla with fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, Balkan-style cheese, herbs, spices, and your choice of sauce.

name: Dürüm – Only Meat
description: A large portion of freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat wrapped in a homemade tortilla with aromatic herbs, spices, and your choice of sauce.

name: Extra Large Dürüm
description: An extra-large portion of freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat wrapped in a homemade tortilla with fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, Balkan-style cheese, herbs, spices, and sauce.

name: Vegetarian Falafel Dürüm
description: Crispy falafel or grilled halloumi wrapped in a homemade tortilla with fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, herbs, spices, and your choice of sauce.

name: Bowl with Bread
description: Freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat served in a bowl with fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, herbs, spices, your choice of sauce, and fresh bread on the side.

name: Bowl with Rice or Fries
description: Freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat served with basmati rice or crispy fries, fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, herbs, spices, and your choice of sauce.

name: Large Bowl with Cheese and Bread
description: A large portion of freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat with fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, Balkan-style cheese, herbs, spices, your choice of sauce, and fresh bread.

name: Large Bowl with Cheese and Rice or Fries
description: A large portion of freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat served with basmati rice or crispy fries, fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, Balkan-style cheese, herbs, spices, and sauce.

name: Vegetarian Falafel or Halloumi Bowl
description: Crispy falafel or grilled halloumi served with fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, herbs, spices, and your choice of sauce.

name: Kebab Box
description: A smaller portion of freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat served with fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, herbs, spices, and your choice of sauce.

name: Kebab Box with Rice
description: A smaller portion of freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat served with basmati rice, fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, herbs, spices, and your choice of sauce.

name: Kebab Box with Fries
description: A smaller portion of freshly grilled chicken, beef, or mixed meat served with crispy fries, fried vegetables, fresh salad, lemon juice, herbs, spices, and your choice of sauce.

name: Salad with Cheese
description: Fresh mixed salad with pomegranate seeds and creamy Balkan-style cheese.

name: Fried Vegetables
description: A mix of fried eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, carrot, and potatoes.
